thread.title: Red hot Deepika Padukone shaking her booty is enough tease for the day – watch video
thread.title_full: Red hot Deepika Padukone shaking her booty is enough tease for the day – watch video

author: Pooja Nayak
title: Red hot Deepika Padukone shaking her booty is enough tease for the day – watch video
text:
Deepika Padukone looks like a million bucks in her latest photoshoot for Instyle 
This is like a sexier version of Deepika Padukone’s ‘Shake That Bootiya On The Floor’ from Finding Fanny. I mean, no seriously! One look at the video and you will know what we’re trying to say. While Deepika is already winning the internet with her pictures with Vin Diesel from their grand premiere of xXx: Return Of Xander Cage. We just came across this sickeningly hot video of Deepika doing a booty dance at last night’s after party. Yes! This happened! Just before hitting the party, DP along with her crew shot for a boomerang video shaking her booty and boy, is it the hottest thing on the internet today? Also read: All eyes were on Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh as they made a STUNNING entry at XXX: The Return of Xander Cage after party 
That shimmery red dress complimented with Deepika’s sexy moves, now if this doesn’t make you say ‘Hot Damn’ then I dunno what will. In fact, we also wouldn’t mind calling it adorably sexy coz Deepika looks cute as a button while moving her booty. Watch the entire video and we bet you will want to play it on loop. Not to mention, Deepika even made Vin Diesel dance to Lungi dance at the premiere last night; that too by actually making him drape a lungi. Indeed, it was one helluva night to remember with Deepika leading the way… A video posted by Deepika padukone (@queen_of.black) on Jan 12, 2017 at 4:24pm PST 
That reminds us how Deepika also had bae Ranveer Singh in company at this xXx after party. The couple not only arrived together but Ranveer even poured his heart out in the media bytes saying how Deepika was always meant to be an international star and that he’s totally loving her chemistry with Vin Diesel. We wonder if Vin, Deepika and Ranveer even danced together at this after party? I’m sure they must have, but only if we could get our hands on an inside video from the party. 
Nevertheless, with this booty dance making its way to the internet, what do you have to say about DP’s moves? Hot or not? Tell us in the comments below and keep watching this space for more updates.
